question: Give me Pixar films and DreamWorks films that won Golden Globe.
sql_query1:
SELECT Film.title 
FROM Film
WHERE (Film.animationStudio = "Pixar" OR Film.animationStudio = "DreamWorks") AND Film.awards = "Golden Globe"
sql_query2:
SELECT Film.title 
FROM Film
WHERE Film.animationStudio = "Pixar" OR Film.animationStudio = "DreamWorks" AND Film.awards = "Golden Globe"
interpretation1: What Pixar films won a Golden Globe and what DreamWorks films won the same award?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all Pixar films and also provide a list of all DreamWorks films that won a Golden Globe.
